programme.desc: Vada Chennai plot A simple carrom player unknowingly gets involved in an ongoing gang war that threatens to destroy his locality. The result? He decides to take a stand and protect his people at any cost! Vetrimaran Vetrimaaran is an Indian film director, screenwriter, and film producer, who works in the Tamil film industry. As of 2021, he has won five National Film Awards, eight Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards, two Filmfare South Awards, and the Amnesty International Italia Award from the 72nd Venice Film Festival.

programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Promi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: MeetZoonicornAliel
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: ABC Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: HOTEL CLEANI-FORNIA
programme.desc: Chai Raja wakes up one morning to find that the hotel is not yet cleaned. He yells at Sundar and the latter immediately gets to work. He cleans up and takes the trash to dump outside. While is he out, Sundar sees Basha peacefully sleeping in his hammock. Sundar dumps the trash at Bashas coconut tree and trots away with a mischievous smile. Basha wakes up with a start to the foul smell. He soon understands what happened. Now it is war! It is trash shower in hotel Kelifronia. And Chai Raja and the customers find trash everywhere they look at. A furious Chai Raja is whacking Sundar left right and centre and the poor dog is regretting his little mischief big times. Only time can say how this mess end.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Yes You Can - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: NO BANANAS!!
programme.desc: Chai Raja in all gusto, pulls open his pantry and finds that he is out of bananas- now how will he make fries?! Oops! Quickly putting Sundar in charge, Chai Raja hops on his rusty cycle and heads off for fresh stock. Meanwhile, Sundar sees the customers line up and for the sake of Chai Raja wants to somehow keep them happy. Sundar sees Basha snacking on his private banana reserve and sprinting over strikes a deal with Basha- give me your bananas for now, and I will let you snack. Basha, after a moments thought agrees and the deal is struck. As Basha in an odd moment of generosity, entertains the customers, Sundar frantically hashes up fritters- but when Basha shows up for his share, Sundarsidelines him and serves the customers. When this happens more than twice, Basha loses his nice-guy face and decides to set things straight. The customers find their plates vanishing and their teas arriving in curious ways. Sundar tries to iron things out, but Basha is in a frenzy. Soon when Chai Raja arrives triumphantly hoisting fresh bananas, he is literally stampeded by the fleeing customers. Sundar stands sheepish as not far away Basha chuckles holding a pile of banana fritters. He bites into one and chews...but then in disgust spits it out; after all Sundar cant cook like Chai Raja. Shrugging, Basha digs out his special reserve banana and chews on it philosophically.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A poor but loving couple secretly sells their most precious things to spend a happy Christmas and buys gifts for each of them.

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: MARDANA MURGA
programme.desc: Not too far from the Hotel California, a muscular six-pack rooster escapes from a chicken truck and to everyone surprise he loves Chai Rajas Banana Fries. Sundar decides to use him against Basha. Now Basha has to outwit the duo and get the rooster back into that chicken truck.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: The Bigger They Are
programme.desc: Odessa feels overwhelmed by her art project, then in the Zooniverse she helps clear the Rainbow Road of a giant bubble – and learns that big problems can become small, manageable ones. You dont have to do everything all on your own and, asking for help can be one of the best tools for problems solving.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: The gift
programme.desc: Yo, Yo, Ragoo and the young boy Theo are invited to Pandora, the princess’s party. Theo’s allergic to peanuts, but, not knowing, Pandora’s made a peanut butter cake for him.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Aladdin unearths a bottle in his yard. On it is written Simsim - DO NOT OPEN. He and Jamillah are curious but Genie is downright terrified. He tells them that Simsim was banished from Genie School. Hes BAD. In a fearful state he tries to hide the bottle but ends up breaking it. Simsim is on the lose causing havoc in Baghdad and its up to Jamillah, Genie and Aladdin to stop him.

programme.title: The Day The Boys Stood Still
programme.desc: Brains does not understand the appeal of Fred’s latest passion: Monster Mud Trucking. Friday makes his muddy dream a reality, never imagining they would awaken the evil Dirt Demons angry about how Humans treat them like…dirt! Brains saves all the boys from being mud statues by learning to love mud trucking.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons
programme.desc: Maple learns the power of imagination when she imagines a dragon in the Zooniverse, and it goes out-of-control!. Learn to think things through.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White – Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Fish Soup
programme.desc: Aladdin waits at the back of the line to buy fish to make fish soup for his mum. When Jamillah arrives wearing a fancy salwar kameeze Aladdin thinks she looks like a princess. Jamillah takes on the role and soon the queue is moving aside to let the great Princess to the front. Things start to go wrong when the fishmonger insists on giving Jamillah the biggest fish on his stall and Aladdin cant carry it home. He drops it in the dirt and Mustafa almost uncovers Jamillahs disguise but luckily Genie arrives just in time to save them.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
Shuteye Popeye 1952
programme.desc: Popeye's snoring is keeping his resident mouse awake. The mouse fights back. Popeye makes a mistake: he traps the mouse in a spinach can that isn't completely empty.

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939
programme.desc: Betty Boop and Pudgy, doing the spring planting, are plagued by crows.

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Smart Alecks-1942
programme.desc: Danny comes into money for capturing an elusive criminal - money which Mugs insists he split equally with the gang while gangsters want to split open Danny.

programme.title: His Trysting Place- 1914
programme.desc: Charlie's wife sends him to the store for a baby bottle with milk. Elsewhere, Ambrose offers to post a love letter for a woman in his boarding house. The two men meet at a restaurant and each takes the other's coat by mistake. Charlie's wife thinks he has a lover; Ambrose's believes he has an illegitimate child.

programme.title: Yes, Yes, Nanette 1925
programme.desc: Nanette sends a letter to her family telling of her new husband, Hillory. When Hillory arrives to meet the family, he gets insulted by each member, including the dog, and loses his wig. After having dinner with the family, Nanette's former lover returns, and Hillory must confront him.

programme.title: Eternally Yours-1939
programme.desc: Anita Halstead, swept off her feet by magician Arturo, finds the results less than magical.

programme.title: Hop to It, Bellhop 1919
programme.desc: Two hotel bell hops get into all kinds of shenanigans between dames, baths and bags of loot.

programme.title: The Bashful Bachelor-1942
programme.desc: Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 28; The Rival
programme.desc: When Opie's efforts fail to attract classmate Karen's personal interest, Thelma Lou steps in to boost Opie's confidence but destroys Barney's along the way. Can Andy realign this skewed love quadrangle?

programme.title: Trav’s First BC Black Bear
programme.desc: Travis \"The Timberwolf\", is in BC on a spot and stalk archery black bear hunt. After looking over a ton of bears this season, he has his heart set on taking his first BC black bear with his bow. Being as stealthy as possible Trav and Cheese are able to sneak into 15 yards of the bear and make a great shot. Trav then heads to the kitchen to make a delicious bear ham with the entire hind quarter

programme.title: Late Season Horseback Bulls - Part 1
programme.desc: Join Mitch and Lynn as they head out by horseback on a high country elk hunt after some late season bulls for their 2nd wedding anniversary. The air is thin and cold but the action is hot and heavy. The horses are saddled and the excitement is high as the romantic couple find bulls on almost every ridge top

programme.title: Late Season Horseback Bulls - Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing with their anniversary hunt, Mitch and Lynn are in the high country on an elk hunt in search of late season horseback bulls. With some hunting pressure in the area from other hunters, they move to a new location and find multiple bulls in a high country saddle. With lots of daylight left they wait them out and put a great bull on the ground!

programme.title: Drum Roll
programme.desc: Sandy beaches and driftwood make the perfect spot for wading out into the shallows to kick off spring fishing for freshwater drum. Josh is accompanied by newcomer Joe, and teaches him to navigate the lake in hip waders. In an area ripe with cattails, Josh shows Joe how to harvest and pickle these unsuspected treats

programme.title: Wild Turkey Confit
programme.desc: Surrounded by endless oaks on the edge of a ranch, Josh sets out to find a spring turkey, the key ingredient in a delicious riverside supper hes planning to make. He is accompanied by Chad, a local archery hunter whos there to help in the hunt and partake in the dinner

programme.title: The Stone Oven
programme.desc: In British Columbia, there is a legend of an ancient stone oven that was built in the mountains during construction of the railroad. Josh sets out on a trip to reconnect with his brothers, do some fishing, explore and ultimately search for this 100-year-old oven if he has come all this way, a meal is in order

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest Justin Simien
programme.desc: Justin Simien is an amazing director (Dear White People) who’s made a hot new doc called Hollywood Black which explores the history of Black folks in cinema. Really deep look at everything from Birth of A Nation to the success of Jordan Peele. The doc is on MGM+. We go deep into the history of Black cinema and talk/argue about Blaxploitation, Hattie McDaniel, Denzel, Tarantino, what the definition of a Black film is, and more.

programme.title: Guest Omar Dorsey
programme.desc: Omar Dorsey is an actor’s actor. He’s starring on Bookie on Max now. Amazing convo about acting and Hollywood and the difference between a character actor and a leading actor.

programme.title: Guest Steven Christopher
programme.desc: Singer, songwriter, and producer Steven Christopher joins the show to talk about his new single, “Don't Wait,” how to not be toxic, creativity in dark times, and more.

programme.title: Guests Dr. Wes Bellamy, Mayor Nikuyah Walker, Will Jones
programme.desc: This weeks conversation revolves around the documentary 'A Time to Yell More Than a Statue' that explores the events surrounding the Unite the Right Rally in Charlottesville in 2017. The guests, Dr. Wes Bellamy and Mayor Nikuyah Walker, discuss the importance of telling their own story and reclaiming the narrative. They address the challenges of fighting against hate and racism in their community, the significance of removing Confederate statues, and the need for healing and unity. The conversation also touches on the role of running and community engagement in the healing process. The conversation delves into the impact of the events in Charlottesville, particularly the summer of 2017, and the ongoing fight against hate and racism. The guests discuss the buildup to the events of August 11th and 12th, the division in the community, and the role of the police chief. They also explore the concept of heritage and hate, the importance of representation, and the sacrifices made in the fight for justice. The conversation emphasizes the need for courage, gratitude, and unity in the face of adversity.

programme.title: It's The Motion That Matters
programme.desc: When you’re in transition and lacking information, fear can creep in. In those times, you need to remember that faith isn’t a feeling, it’s a behavior. And sometimes, in order to move forward, you need to learn to step out in doubt.

programme.title: The Limp Won't Make You Late
programme.desc: Lean on Him to lead you. In “The Limp Won’t Make You Late,” Pastor Steven reveals that God has you exactly where He needs you — and if you’ll lean on Him, He’ll give you what you need to get through.

programme.title: God Knows, You Don't
programme.desc: Faith isn’t a destination. In “God Knows You Don’t,” Pastor Steven shows us that even though we don’t know what’s next, we can trust that God is guiding our steps.

programme.title: It's Not Over
programme.desc: Things really can change for you. Your past is not your prophecy. Stop allowing fear to predict your future, and begin to see it how God sees it. Pastor Jabin Chavez encourages us: “It’s Not Over.”

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Fell Asleep
programme.desc: This is your wake-up call! In “I Didn’t Know I Fell Asleep,” Pastor Robert Madu gives us some tools to help us identify where we’ve fallen (spiritually) asleep.
